name: mayapple
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant with white, yellow, or red flowers that grows in woods in eastern North America and is used to make medicines: Under foot were blooming flowers like May apple, violets, and verbenas. Pharmaceutical researchers are using compounds in the mayapple to make anti-tumour drugs.
